title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP previews Game 6 of the NBA finals. How will Steph bounce back after a tough Game 5? Chris Simms checks in to discuss his 2022 QB rankings. New Lakers Head Coach Darvin Ham shares his plans to incorporate Russ Westbrook.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
